title: conferred on me by section 12 (2) of the Financial Provisions (Covid-19) Act
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Financial Provisions (Covid-19) Act 2020
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Financial Provisions (Covid-19) Act 2020 

(Commencement) Order 2020.
text_norm: 1 order may cited financial provision (covid-19) act 2020 (commencement) order 2020

title: conferred on me by section 12 (2) of the Financial Provisions (Covid-19) Act
heading: 2. The 20th day of July 2020 is appointed as the day on which the Financial
text_raw:
2. The 20th day of July 2020 is appointed as the day on which the Financial 

Provisions (Covid-19) Act 2020 shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

20 July, 2020. 

PASCHAL DONOHOE, 
Minister for Finance. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 26th January, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [756] 3 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH
